text: Jörg Ohm (14 March 1944 - 21 May 2020) was an East German football player and manager. He played in the DDR-Oberliga for both Chemie Leipzig and 1. FC Magdeburg. As a defender he won the championship four times between 1964 and 1975. Ohm began to play football in the youth department of BSG Lokomotive Haldensleben, north of Magdeburg. In 1962 he joined the focus club of BSG Lokomotive, SC Lokomotive Leipzig, after playing four matches for the youth national team in the spring. Ohm died on 21 May 2020, aged 76.Jörg Ohm RIP ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German footballers Category:German football managers
title: Jörg Ohm
